thread.title: Flights from BWI to Ireland for $99
thread.title_full: Flights from BWI to Ireland for $99

author: Chris Kaltenbach
title: Flights from BWI to Ireland for $99
text:
This summer, a dip in prices at the Hyatt Regency Chesapeake Bay Golf Resort, Spa and Marina means you can take a dip in their pool, free of both guilt and debt. ( Darcy Costello ) 
WOW Air , which started offering flights between BWI Thurgood Marshall Airport and various European destinations through Reykjavik, Iceland in May , announced Monday that it is offering service to Dublin, Ireland. The flights are being offered two days a week, with one-way fares as low as $99. Checked baggage, assigned seating and other additional charges may apply. 
“We recognize the vast market for heritage travel to Ireland and we’re happy to offer affordable year-round service from BWI to Dublin,” Skuli Mogensen, WOW Air’s founder and CEO, said in a press release. 
Wow Air also offers service from BWI to Paris, London, Amsterdam, Copenhagen and Berlin. 
More details are available on the WOW Air website .
